title: Cheerleader Skin Line
body:
http://36.media.tumblr.com/e56f77a1d283f7aa788306e74597b0c5/tumblr_nt8gbhf6nk1rru8eeo1_1280.png

https://40.media.tumblr.com/628e8f0d7efd0377324ae49d5d9663f0/tumblr_nhxizkzltT1rgdio9o1_500.png

http://grabilla.com/05903-66876dcd-6309-48e1-91ce-e0114ded0da1.png

I feel like this would go well with the Football team skins :D

replies.body:
One for each role as well as nation maybe?

Top lane Irelia(Ionia), jungle Vi(Piltover), mid lane Katarina(Noxus), ADC Tristana(Bandle City), support Lux(Demacia)
Rek'Sai (Void)
I can't imagine Rek'sai cheering, but I *can* imagine Kog'Maw wearing a sweater and having a megaphone.

{{champion:421}} /dance

That's good enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Rand0mH3r0X,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-09-03T22:57:26.653+0000)
>
> Rek'Sai (Void)

Lol, I can totally imagine her shaking her pom poms to AA and jumping up and twirling to Q. Her tunnels... uhh... Idk what her tunnels would, be, lel.
I read that as spanking her pum pum..
Annie needs a skin.  That TIbbers in a football uniform is adorbs.
No she does not shes got waaay to many skins

> [{quoted}](name=LeeDark,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2015-09-04T08:10:41.868+0000)
>
> Annie needs a skin.  That TIbbers in a football uniform is adorbs.

Well, she's independent so she wouldn't fit in a nation, and to be fair she has 9 skins already(10 if you count her default).

~~ADC Tristana~~

ADC Urgot ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
I can't see Vi or Tristana being a cheerleader.
Vi: "Give me a P! For punch!!"

> [{quoted}](name=Jarrito232,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2015-09-04T18:58:32.651+0000)
>
> I can't see Vi or Tristana being a cheerleader.

...
What about Trist being one of those guys that carries peanuts and stuff around?
She could drop a popcorn bag on your head and it blows up, and launch peanuts at your face.
yesssssss.

Vi I can see being a cheerleader. Make her fists into ponpons. :3

Tristana would be great as the T-shirt cannon guy. Vi on the other hand seems more likely to be involved in the sport instead of on the sidelines, especially if it was hockey or baseball.


And boxing but that is pretty obvious.

> [{quoted}](name=Jarrito232,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=0003000200010000,timestamp=2015-09-05T20:03:44.991+0000)

Nah, imagine Vi punching people with giant pon pons!

Where's Cheerleader Urgot or Sion???
It's quarter back sion

> [{quoted}](name=IGotScuttleCrabs,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-09-04T02:01:07.815+0000)
>
> It's quarter back sion

linebacker* his ult is perfect for that
Came for Cheerleader Gragas, was disappointed.
I like Lux and Annie, Katarina's just looks like an excuse to put her in a skirt lol.
Like there needs to be an excuse for Kat anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=Chromatic Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-09-03T23:55:43.886+0000)
>
> I like Lux and Annie, Katarina's just looks like an excuse to put her in a skirt lol.

You say that like it's a bad thing. Where you see an excuse to do something, I see a divine responsibility. Get to work Rito.

Well at least you're honest 

+1

Why are people so offended by slutty skins? Skins are cosmetic's , meaning people want to change how their champion looks, if they want to be a Slutty Cheerleader Katarina Go for it, if they wanna be a half naked barbarian Sion why not? Its a dam video who gives a shit.

I don't think I said I was offended. I'm saying that compared to others, cheerleader doesn't really fit on Katarina, at least imo. If someone wanted a cheerleader Vi with punching pompoms, Karma with fan-poms, or Draven in a skirt, I wouldn't really care.

Let this happen.

Also, this means we need a Twerk Team skin line.

It would include {{champion:76}}, Frostbutt {{champion:39}}, dat {{champion:22}}, DJ {{champion:37}}, and {{champion:114}}.

> [{quoted}](name=Spizzle9000,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-03T19:22:36.911+0000)

>

Agreed. I have no idea who would downvote such an amazing idea. If people say it's sexist or objectifying women, fuck it. We'll objectify men, too. We can make a Magic Mic XL themed skin line with Draven, Graves, Vladimir, Yasuo, and Varus.
Glad I'm not the only one who considers Vladimir some top tier man-material.

> [{quoted}](name=TheUntitledKing,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=0002000100000002,timestamp=2015-09-04T09:58:33.912+0000)

xD Yasssss! I'm a straight dude, but seriously though, Vlad is pretty damn awesome.
... Is it weird if I say I'd buy both lines? ;~;

> [{quoted}](name=RickyJuice,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KJ4Moaju,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-03T20:18:27.723+0000)

Yassss! But we still need a twerk team skin line. And, yeah, I'm in mar%%%%% band so I know what a drum major is. I'm glad I'm not the only  one. xD
Need Cheer squad urgot

As long as it isn't just a reason to put them in skin tight, exposing clothes ^.^ If you're going to make a cheerleader line, it should be with supports, so cheerleader thresh, braum, and alistar are there as well :D

Cheerleading itself is just an excuse to put girls in skin tight, exposing clothes... and then have them dance.

Though speaking of it, you couldn't do it in heels.
Male cheerleaders are a thing too {{champion:44}}
Oh god, doing a routine in heels? Impossible, unless you're fine with a couple broken ankles xD

Sometimes! >.>

Although male cheerleaders *do* exist. Mostly in the North side of the USA than the South, if I recall correctly. Think there's a social stigma...

But having one or two male cheerleader champions wouldn't hurt, and it might boost the sales of the ladies if people aren't thinking it's just an excuse (even if it is! all about marketing!).
Come on Katarina.  Cheerleaders don't wear heels; strippers do.

im all for cheerleaders...but not annie.
she has been used ay too much by RIOT >_<

give the girl a break.
cheerleader sion
cheerleader kat gave me a nosebleed
must not fap
Missing {{champion:102}}
